Description.Text: Facilities The hotel offers a laundry. Parking facilities available to guests include a garage (for a fee) and a car park. Rooms All rooms feature air conditioning, central heating and a bathroom. Each accommodation unit features separate bedrooms or a double bed. A safe is also available. The accommodation units offer a range of amenities, including tea and coffee making equipment. An ironing set is also available to guests. Each accommodation unit offers a telephone, a TV, a radio, an alarm clock and wireless internet access. Each of the bathrooms features a shower, a bathtub and a hairdryer. Sports/Entertainment The hotel offers guests leisure options, including a gym (no extra charge).

All rooms feature air conditioning, central heating and a bathroom. Each accommodation unit features separate bedrooms or a double bed. A safe is also available. The accommodation units offer a range of amenities, including tea and coffee making equipment. An ironing set is also available to guests. Each accommodation unit offers a telephone, a TV, a radio, an alarm clock and wireless internet access. Each of the bathrooms features a shower, a bathtub and a hairdryer.
The hotel offers a laundry. Parking facilities available to guests include a garage (for a fee) and a car park.
The hotel offers guests leisure options, including a gym (no extra charge).
*Five or more reservations booked for the same travel dates will result in a Groups Booking and rates and terms are subject to change*

RoomType.text: Double Standard Queen Room + Free Wifi

Message.Text:
****************************************************************************** TRIPLE ROOMS:NO ROLLAWAY BEDS, THE 3RH AND 4TH PAX STAY AT THE 2 X QUEEN BEDS ROOM(TW) AND SHARE THE EXISTING BEDDING / ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ HABITACIONES TRIPLES: SON 2 CAMAS DOBLES. NO HAY SUPLETORIAS ******************************************************************************

*** BOOKINGS FROM 5 ROOMS ARE CONSIDERED AS A GROUP. THE HOTEL WILL SEND NEW CONDITIONS. PLEASE CONTACT US AT YOUR EARLIEST CONVENIENCE ***/ ³***RESERVAS DE 5 O MAS HABITACIONES SERAN CONSIDERADAS GRUPO. EL HOTEL ENVIA³NUEVAS CONDICIONES. POR FAVOR INFORMENOS CON LA MAYOR BREVEDAD POSIBLE.***

MANDATORY FACILITY FEE OF $18+8.875% per night/per room direct payment at the hotel. It includes: comprenhensive daily fee for facility use and amenities bundle,inclusive of premium WiFi for up to six streaming devices per room during your stay, unlimited local and domestic long-distance telephone calls and messaging, continental brekfast, and, where applicable, 24-hour use of business and fitness centers // FACILITY FEE DE PAGO OBLIGATORIO EN EL MOMENTO DEL CHECK IN (DIRECTAMENTE EN EL HOTEL) DE 18$ + 8.875% por noche y por habitaci¢n

THE ROOFTOP BAR IS CLOSED FOR CONSTRUCTION UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE/ EL BAR DE LA TERRAZA ESTA CERRADO POR REFORMAS HASTA NUEVO AVISO.

OCCUPANCY TAX 3.5$ PER ROOM, PER NIGHT DIRECT PAYMENT AT THE HOTEL // OCCUPANCY TAX 3.5$ POR HABITACION, POR NOCHE SERA PAGO DIRECTO EN EL HOTEL

**** THE HOTEL WILL TAKE PREAUTHORIZATION ON THE CREDIT/DEBIT CARD USED TO RESERVE 72 HOURS PRIOR TO THE DATE OF ARRIVAL TO GUARANTEE THE RESERVATION **** EL HOTEL PREAUTORIZARA LA TARJETA DEL CLIENTE 72 HORAS ANTES DE LA LLEGADA DEL CLIENTE PARA GARANTIZAR LA RESERVA

Important notices: In case of any amendment please contact us to check the rates and conditions as these could change - Hotel will invoice the total amount of this booking in case of no show / En caso de modificacion, por favor contacten con nosotros para verificar las tarifas y condiciones de la reserva ya que podrian ser diferentes - En caso de no show el hotel se reserva el derecho de aplicar gastos del 100%
